project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application allowing users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. Store the contacts in a JSON file and provide a terminal interface for interaction.

task.name: Implement feature to add a contact
Implement feature to search for a contact
Implement feature to update a contact
Implement feature to delete a contact
Implement JSON file handling for storing contacts
Implement terminal interface for user interaction
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
